fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Justice and fondamental rights, European Foreign Policy, Enlargement Policy, European integration Policy, Development Policy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Member of the International Federation for Human Rights (FIDH)
goals__remit: The Anti-Discrimination Center Memorial Brussels is an organization that fights against all form of discrimination in post-soviet countries. ADC "Memorial" wants to defend the rights of minorities and vulnerable groups and oppose racism, sexism, homophobia and all other forms of xenophobia in post-soviet countries. ADC "Memorial" uses a large number of tools to raise awareness of discrimination among the general public and authorities and to fight discrimination: reporting, advocacy, legal cases, campaigns.
